item.title: [HADOOP-17236] Bump up snakeyaml to 1.26 to mitigate CVE-2017-18640
item.description: Bump up snakeyaml to 1.26 to mitigate CVE-2017-18640
item.summary: Bump up snakeyaml to 1.26 to mitigate CVE-2017-18640

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

brahmareddy any updates? Or it is good to go?
There are no compile time dependency changes; only test dependency change. And this dependency is used in only one source file, so I think we're good to go.
Patch applies cleanly to branch-3.3, too. Thanks brahmareddy
ananysin Sure, thanks..will create Jira to cherry-pick this.
Cherry-picked to branch-3.2 and branch-3.2.3. compiled and ran tests, didn't notice any failures.. ananysin thanks to bringing me to my notice.
